about_the_game:
Immerse yourself in the world of Victoria, an adventure and strategy game that takes you on an unforgettable journey across the world's oceans. Accompanied by the nao Victoria, a ship with its own spirit and personality that historically sailed around the world for the first time, you will explore mysterious places and face challenges that will test your wits.

  • Maritime Exploration: Travel from the historic Guadalquivir River to the ends of the earth, discovering new routes and hidden secrets in seas never before navigated.

  • Puzzles and Physical Challenges: Solve puzzles that require critical thinking and overcome physical obstacles using innovative mechanics based on 16th century reality.

  • Historical and Cultural Interaction: Interact with characters of the era and participate in events that shaped the course of maritime history, providing an educational experience of didactic fun.

  • Immersive Graphics and Sound: Enjoy detailed visuals and sound design that fully immerse you in the era of maritime exploration, with realistic sound effects and a captivating soundtrack.

  • Learning and Fun: Learn about the history of sailing, life at sea and world exploration, all while having fun managing resources, navigating unfamiliar routes and making decisions that will affect the fate of your crew and your ship.

Join the Adventure: Are you ready to set sail and uncover the secrets that the world's oceans hold?

Accompanied by the nao Victoria, a ship with its own spirit and personality that historically sailed around the world for the first time, you will explore mysterious places and face challenges that will test your wits.

name: Victoria: La Primera

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E5200
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 9800GTX+ (1GB)
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 206 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 560
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: Immerse yourself in the world of the nao Victoria, a ship with its own spirit and personality that historically sailed around the world for the first time. Explore mysterious places by point-and-click and face challenges that will test your wits.
